snippet.title: 2D Hand Drawn Unity Game || Tadpole Tales Devlog 19
snippet.description:
If you wish to support, please Wishlist our tiny game on Steam! ❤
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1428900/Tadpole_Tales/

🐸Interested in Playtesting?🐸
Hop on our discord!

Screenshake tutorial - https://youtu.be/8PXPyyVu_6I

♥ Let's Connect!♥
Discord - https://discord.gg/wwwR4Wr
Twitter - https://twitter.com/zizhen96
Instagram -https://www.instagram.com/zizhenandrew/
My Games - https://zizhen96.itch.io

About
Hey, my name is Andrew.  I am an indie developer currently working on a small game called Tadpole tales in Unity. The game is about a tiny tadpole cleaning the river and fighting pollution. Alongside I am mostly working with my best friend Giacomo who is an amazing artist/animator. This is my devlog, where I post my weekly/monthly progress either about the game or myself as a game developer in general. 
Thank you for checking in! 

People who works/worked on the Tadpole Tales
Andrew(me)
Giacomo - https://www.instagram.com/ginkovonagrum/
Rebecca - https://www.instagram.com/rebeccaperr...
ActEsper - https://www.youtube.com/user/ActBlader
Sebastian - https://www.facebook.com/sorrelltheband/
Tomer - Tomer - https://tomerbarnea.myportfolio.com/
#indiegame #devlog #gamedevelopment



Contents:
00:00 Intro
00:33 Development Updates
03:32 Life Updates
04:20 QnA
05:05 Thank you!
